```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(palmerpenguins)

```

```{r}
penguins |> 
  ggplot(mapping=aes(x=body_mass_g, y=flipper_length_mm, color = species))+
  geom_point()+
  labs(
    title="Penguins Body Mass compared to Flipper Length",
    x= "Body Mass",
    y = "Flipper Length",
  )
```
